messages.subject: homeschooling in PA was(Kim's Introduction)
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Cindy, I do have all the laws now and know all that I need to know (I think).  It was a long time ago that I was that naive.  The problem is that there
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Cindy, I do have all the laws now and know all that I need to know (I
think). It was a long time ago that I was that naive. The problem is that
there are many who are still that naive.

I have talked to many people who use a regimented approach to homeschooling.
Also many people don't know they don't need to use a curriculum and spend
hundreds a year on one.

That's why I like email groups like this one, they help to spread the word.

Kim

messages.subject: Re: homeschooling in PA was(Kim's Introduction)
messages.msgSnippet: Is there a support group in your area?  The Pennsylvania Home Education Network might be a good place to start.  I don t belong to one of their groups, but I
messages.messageBody:
Is there a support group in your area? The Pennsylvania Home Education
Network might be a good place to start. I don't belong to one of their
groups, but I did contact them about homeschooling laws when I started and
they were very informative.

Cindy Berkowitz
